122.content:
Sam returned home feeling his heart beating faster than ever. He couldn’t believe at what his eyes had witnessed that morning. The experience had been so astounding and unexpected that he had to return those two girls to their original state.

Now that he was in his apartment, hidden from view in the safety of his own room he decided to investigate on the strange remote he had find in the middle of the streets. As he began observing the dozens of buttons on it he couldn’t stop his mind from wandering. It was true that he had dreamed for something like this but to actually receive it, seemed to him so strange that he truly was wondering if he had gone mad or if the thing was as real as he. Focusing he resumed his task, taking great care in controlling the remote in all of its parts.

No marks, no sign of old usage, not even the producer stamp was on it.

It was only a black remote, just as any other normally used for any televisions, but with the main difference that this one changed weight related aspects of the people surrounding him.

Sam was ecstatic with this finding, finally he could realize all those dreams that he had always had in regard to weighty women. Finally he could enjoy all the fatties he ever wanted in real life and not only through a screen. As he kept noticing more and more buttons on the remote his smile grew wider and wider, until it seemed to engulf his entire head. Not only he could change the body mass of the target, making it fat or skinny, but he also could enhance the hunger, or lack of, in his target. He could change the caloric amount of the food near his target, there were even a couple of buttons he didn’t know anything about it, but he was surely going to try them sooner or later.

Now, all he had to do was to find a test subject and begin his experimentations.
As he turned his head toward the door of his room, a manic grin disrupted his features. He already knew to whom he could start.

His flatmate, Regina Williams.

She was a quite spoiled young woman, sometimes too bitchy and way too much self centerd to care about others. He had always looked at her with a sense of pity for she was way too skinny for his tastes and yet, he could see she had the potential to become a truly wonderful BBW. Sure, she was a little bit too focused on a healthy living maybe but, if he could have his way, that was going to change for her.

Sam entered the dining room of the apartment, the remote safely tucked in his pockets when he suddenly stopped, seeing Regina’s back disappear toward the guest room, usually used as a private gym by the health nut girl. Grinning maliciously he moved as stealthily as he could toward the door and then pointed the remote toward her back, preparing his first series of tests to be conducted on the girl.

As a starter he modified her metabolism, slowing it down at its lowest value, he hoped for an external signal, some way of informing him that the deed was done, but he knew already that a change of her metabolism alone wouldn’t have caused any external changes. It was then that he proceeded with the two tests that could actually prove to him that the remote was really working.

Silently he moved the remote toward the snack bar and the bottle of water of the exercising girl, changing their caloric intake, increasing it until the two items were, singularly, as caloric as an entire fried chicken. Then, and only then, he switched the remote toward Regina, increasing her sense of hunger. As he manned the remote he could see her brow furrowing as she began battling the internal sensation of being hungry. Sam saw her as she tried to ignore it, as she tried to keep doing her routine, but the remote was still pointed at her, making her feeling hungrier by the minute. Only when he saw that she was beginning to shake visibly he stopped, sure that even she had to succumb to that sensation of hunger.


Regina was doing some simple exercise, lifting weights and had planned to run on her treadmill for fifteen minutes right after she finished but, suddenly, she felt this powerful surge of hunger in the pit of her stomach. She felt it so strong that she almost doubled over in pain, one arm on her growling belly and the other, frantically grasping for her snack bar in the air. As soon as her fingers closed on its wrapper she grabbed it and began stuffing it in her mouth, taking huge bites out of it as her toned middle began to bloat outward and outward.

Sam was aghast at the show he was witnessing. Now he could say that he was truly witnessing that the remote was real and working. As he stayed there on the door, raptured from the show, he couldn’t stop thinking at the countless of young women that were at his school or in his gym.

He had only to decided what to do with Regina. Could he really change her so much, until it was transformed in his personal eating machine? Sure to have her around, growing fatter and fatter right in front of him was exciting but could he really condemn her to that fate?

"Hi everyone!" Aunt carrie greeted giving Sam and his sister a hug. "Hey Aunt Carrie" Sam and his sister said simultaneously. "Hey sis" "Hey having a little snack there." aunt Carrie smirked pointing at her sister's measly carrot. "Yeah, well, just watching my weight." Sam's mother shrugged. "Oh you poor thing. Must be hard having such a slow metabolism. By the way have you lost that extra 5 pounds yet?" "No" growled the milf. "Though I see you're still thin as ever."
Aunt Carrie giggled "Even in my forties, I'm still thin as a rake." "Must be nice." Mom muttered. "Oh now now, you always did have trouble keeping your weight in check." "Well being around a sister who could eat whatever she wanted and never gain an ounce wasn't too good for my figure." The frustration in Sam's mom's voice was apparent. "That is a shame. Never getting to eat fastfood and turning down desserts. They're just so yummy! Why in fact I just had a big juicy burger before coming here."

Sam enjoyed listening to his Aunt brag about how much she ate. If only the weight stayed.

"Anyway, I've got some boxes I want moved at my house and I was hoping Sam could lend me a hand." Aunt Carrie sweetly asked.
"Sure, happy to lend a hand." "Ooh thanks darling." Aunt carrie kissed Sam on the cheek as she hugged him.
Aunt Carrie than took her exit "TaTa Have to run now. I'm off to have ice cream with the girls."

Sam's mom threw her carrot in the trash and stomped to the freezer.
"Mom what're you doing?" asked the sister.
"Hmmph! Having some ice cream!" mom pouted "I can only care about a thin waist so much before wanting to eat like everyone else."

His mother's words sparked an idea in Sam. Perhaps he could make everyone happy if he used the remote on his aunt.
1441122.title: an aunt is to become fat and flabby

1442.content:
There were so many obnoxious thin girls in his life that Sam always yearned to see fat, usually fantasizing them being force fed. Now via the remote, Sam was going to flip their lives on its back, permanently ruining their slim bodies and corrupting their "healthy" lifestyles. Sam moaned in pleasure picturing those irksome women helplessly stuffing themselves with foods they would never touch.

There were women who constantly shoved their diets in others faces. Such as his coworker Allyson an ardent vegan. Ever the typical vegan she condemned those who ate meat and ostensibly ate her vegetables preaching how perfect she was. How satisfying it would be making her altering her to being disgusted by vegetables and craving greasy meats and sugary goods.

Then there was the broad who lived next door named Betty, who was obsessed with fitness. Devoted to her exercises and constantly staying active never slacken her regiment. Just being too physical irritated Sam, but she did far worse, she always pressured other women to work out and insidiously convincing them to decline tasty high calorie foods. Sam reveled in the thought of killing her energy and diminishing her strong will power. Betty becoming a weak, lazy, and weak-willed couch potato filled Sam will genuine satisfaction.

And yet there were far more impetuous girls deserving of a most-fitting weight gain.

Where would Sam start his mission.
1442.title: he hates

info.brief_description: One day Sam finds a remote that lets him make women gain weight. What will he do?
info.description:
Sam is your stereotype single bachelor. Boring job, early 20's, lots of friends, hot bod, and all that stuff. Oh yeah, and he's a closet FA. He could get any chick he wants, but they're all too skinny. One night he wishes he could change that. The next morning a remote appears besaide him. I wonder what it does...
Rules
No male weight gain, female only
No immobility
No extreme weight gain (e.g. 1000 lbs in one sitting)
No immediate weight gain or extreme hunger, preferably just give them a reason (read the first few chapters for examples)
No children gaining (13 and under)
He can choose where they gain weight but don't be unrealistic
You can choose to stick with one girl, or follow each girl's weight gain
